title: FPS problems
body: Got a new graphics card and before I got it I was getting 60fps and higher now with the new graphic card I get 30 fps and below.I tried full repair lowered settings and nothing worked.(GeForce Gtx 750 ti and it's plugged in right)

replies.body: Anytime a player installs a new graphics card, I'd always recommend making sure that they [**install the proper drivers for their new GPU**](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/index.aspx?lang=en-us) just in case that they haven't. If the issues still hang, contact me via a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
